isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES

note.para: The left and right countershaft assemblies are identical and reassembled in the same manner.

step1.para: If previously removed, install the key in the keyway of the countershaft ( Figure 141).

figure.caption: Figure 141. Install Key in Keyway of Countershaft

step1.para: Align keyway of 3rd gear with the key in countershaft and press the 3rd gear onto the countershaft, with timing tooth marked with an "O" facing the rear of the countershaft ( Figure 142).

figure.caption: Figure 142. Align Keyway of 3rd Gear With Key in Countershaft

step1.para: Align the keyway of the PTO gear with the keyway in the countershaft. Press the PTO gear onto the countershaft with the long hub of the gear to the front ( Figure 143).

figure.caption: Figure 143. Align Keyway of PTO Gear With Keyway in Countershaft

step1.para: Align the keyway of the countershaft drive gear with the key on the countershaft. Press the countershaft drive gear onto the countershaft with the long hub to the rear, timing tooth marked with an "O" to the front ( Figure 144).

figure.caption: Figure 144. Align Keyway of Countershaft Drive Gear With Key on Countershaft

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the groove on the front of each countershaft ( Figure 145).

figure.caption: Figure 145. Install Snap Ring in Groove on Front of Each Countershaft
